it.riccardotraverso.java.io

Class MultiFileInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • it.riccardotraverso.java.io.MultiFileInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class MultiFileInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream
implements java.io.Closeable
    Manages multiple input files in a sequence as a single input stream, without the need of concatenating them together first. When the end of file is reached for a file, the stream continues looking for characters into the next one (if any).
